english.segment1: Don't you ever forget that he has given us a future and a hope.
english.segment2: Said it's sad, said it was a shame. Bet you thought I caught a boat to bombay. On the line just to let you know. I will be around
english.segment3: Underneath the bridge to nowhere. Like I'm livin' out a game of solitaire. Goin' up to a better day. I will be around
english.segment4: Hey world, it's me. I still have the heart, still have the dream
english.segment5: Come on, people. We've got to come together. It's you and me. Hope will make us stronger. Freedom it rings. Do you hear it calling. Reach out and touch. And love will take us higher
english.segment6: Somebody threw a brick at my vision. Tried to sabotage my mission. Either way, I believe. I will be around
english.segment7: I wanna know, people are you with me. Open up your heart and just believe. Take a step, let me hear you say. I will be around
english.segment8: Hey world, it's me. I still have the heart, still have the dream
english.segment9: For he knows the plans he has for you. A plan to prosper and not to harm you. To give you a future, and a hope
